# R Markdown


```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
for (country in countries) {
  cat('\n') 
  cat("#", country, "\n") 
  
  data_from_country <- extract_data_by_country(country)
  plots <- do_some_magic_on_Q40(extract_Q40_from_data(data_from_country))
  
  grid.arrange(males=plots[[1]], females=plots[[2]])
  
  cat('\n') 

}
```
